title: How to Make Soapy Ammonia Cleaning Solution

steps.title: Locate concentrate ammonia solution.
steps.content: Locate concentrate ammonia solution. It's readily available in supermarkets in the household cleaner sections of larger supermarkets in the US. Otherwise, try hardware shops and places that sell industrial cleaners. You will probably want to buy the smallest possible bottle since you won't need a lot.

steps.title: Use rubber gloves and goggles - ammonia can burn skin and eyes.
steps.content: Use rubber gloves and goggles - ammonia can burn skin and eyes.

steps.title: Be sure to make your mixture in a well-ventilated area.
steps.content: Be sure to make your mixture in a well-ventilated area.

steps.title: Do NOT lean over the bottles while you are pouring.
steps.content: Do NOT lean over the bottles while you are pouring.

steps.title: Organize this task so that you will be pouring over a sink just in case there is any dripping.
steps.content: Organize this task so that you will be pouring over a sink just in case there is any dripping.

steps.title: Use a 12 oz.
steps.content: Use a 12 oz. plastic bottle spray bottle. These are widely available in grocery stores, chain stores, hardware stores. Basic safety rules say never reuse old commercial cleaner bottles. Old labels or color schemes can be confusing, and new bottles are inexpensive.

steps.title: First Fill the bottle with tap water.
steps.content: First Fill the bottle with tap water. Always add ammonia to water, not the other way around

steps.title: Pour out a third of a cup of water from the bottle to make room for the ammonia.
steps.content: Pour out a third of a cup of water from the bottle to make room for the ammonia.

steps.title: With a funnel, pour about a third of a cup of ammonia into the bottle.
steps.content: With a funnel, pour about a third of a cup of ammonia into the bottle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add a squirt of dishwashing liquid.
steps.content: Add a squirt of dishwashing liquid. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Write "Soapy Ammonia" on the bottle with the indelible marker.
steps.content: Write "Soapy Ammonia" on the bottle with the indelible marker.

steps.title: Write "Danger:
steps.content: Write "Danger: Do not mix with Bleach" [3] X Research source

steps.title: Write "POISON" and keep the mixture, and the bottle of ammonia out of children's reach.
